HepMC Interface
An interface to the HepMC [1] standard event record format has been provided by M. Kirsanov. To use it, the relevant libraires need to be linked, as explained in the README file. The (simple) procedure to translate PYTHIA 8 events into HepMC ones is then illustrated in the main11.c main program.
References
M. Dobbs and J.B. Hansen, Computer Physics Comm. 134 (2001) 41
